meanings.sent1: The oxygenic plants in the garden release oxygen into the air.
meanings.sent2: The hospital room had an oxygenic smell due to the fresh air coming in.
meanings.sent3: The oxygenic flowers seemed to be breathing life into the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as an oxygenic breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The oxygenic atmosphere of the forest filled her lungs with vitality.

meanings.sent1: The oxygenic solution bubbled with life-saving oxygen.
meanings.sent2: The diver's oxygenic tank helped him breathe underwater.
meanings.sent3: The oxygenic bubbles in the drink made it seem more refreshing.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an oxygenic boost to her morale.
meanings.sent5: The oxygenic mask provided the patient with the necessary air to survive.
